X-TIKA:content:
Greetings From Mr Dennis

Dear Sir/Madam,

Dear Friend, My name is Mr Dennis Stevenson,The 
Chairman of the Board of Directors,  bank of Scotland, United Kingdom.I 
have only written to seek your indulgence and assistance.

I wish to 
make a transfer involving a huge amount of money worth, (Fifteen-
million pounds sterlings) (£15,000,000.00)pounds sterlings.I am 
proposing to make this transfer to a designated bank account of your 
choice.Thus, i need your indulgence and support. I propose an offer of 
45% of the total amount to be yours after the transfer has been 
successfully concluded.

Kindly reply me stating your interest, and I 
shall furnish you with the details and necessary proceedure with which 
to make the transfer.I anxiously await your response, Send your replies 
to <dennistevenson@yahoo.co.uk> Thanks and Godbless you.

Thanks
Mr 
Dennis Stevenson.
